name: mapbox-gl-arcgis-tiled-map-service
description: ArcGIS Tile Map Service custom source plugin for Mapbox GL
author: Kristofor Carle <kris@maphubs.com>

scripts.build-dev: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js --debug --ignore-transform unassertify --standalone ArcGISTiledMapServiceSource > dist/mapbox-gl-arcgis-tiled-map-service-dev.js
scripts.build-min: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js --debug --plugin [minifyify --map mapbox-gl-arcgis-tiled-map-service.js.map --output dist/mapbox-gl-arcgis-tiled-map-service.js.map] --standalone ArcGISTiledMapServiceSource | derequire > dist/mapbox-gl-arcgis-tiled-map-service.js
